entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 then light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow late in the evening. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
